## generateIntentId() function

Generates an ID for an Intent.

It follows our Intent ID convention that does not have spaces and ends with `Intent`<!-- -->.


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function generateIntentId(name: string): string | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

string \| undefined
